channel.title: Suspended for 1d then got extended to 30d for no clear reason
channel.description:
> [color=red]*For better/faster support, try Discord: https://discord.gg/tol[/color]
What happened: I was Suspended for 1d for being afk in jail. (Really stupid on my part I apologize) Logged on after one day had passed and it had suddenly become a 30d suspension!
Unsure what Ban Evasion Means?? if that has increased it I really don't know why.
any help would be appreciated!! [TOL%20-%20Ban%20Reason|690x388](upload://bKR8AA9LTlRaGff8QdzB0fSoWyy.jpeg)
